messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Elssa??
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 12/8/2001 3:51:44 AM Eastern Standard Time, ... This group is somewhere in the Northeast. I forget exactly what state the guy told me. . .
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 12/8/2001 3:51:44 AM Eastern Standard Time,
ElsaHaas@... writes:


> I thought I remembered they were in California, and I didn’t think you were.
> Where are you/ they?
>
> Elsa Haas
>

This group is somewhere in the Northeast. I forget exactly what state the guy
told me. . . but I know some friends went this summer for a 8 week thing and
I believe it was in New York. . . at least between here (Philly) and Vermont.
:) I know. . .a lot of area between there. The people who run it (I think its
called the Sonlight Foundation . . . the name of the entire program) are
coming to my friend's house to give a program about the whole thing. . . not
necessarily the autism part, but the entire program.

living in abundance
lovemary

I cannot judge my own path and SELF, having the knowledge that I have chosen
to come here to experience these specific issues and grow, learn, and
Remember Who I Am.


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: RE: [Unschooling-dotcom] Elssa??
messages.msgSnippet: I thought I remembered they were in California, and I didn’t think you were. Where are you/ they? Elsa Haas ... From: lite2yu@aol.com
messages.messageBody:
I thought I remembered they were in California, and I didnt think you were.
Where are you/ they?

Elsa Haas

-----Original Message-----
From: lite2yu@... [mailto:lite2yu@...]
Sent: Friday, December 07, 2001 5:05 PM
To: Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [Unschooling-dotcom] Elssa??

Elsa,

I think it was you who asked me if the name of that program for children
with
autism was Sonrise, and yes, it is, and it also has another part to it that
is just for individual or family empowerment.

lovemary

I cannot judge my own path and SELF, having the knowledge that I have chosen
to come here to experience these specific issues and grow, learn, and
Remember Who I Am.
